summary: feat(boe): Implement Bank of England API Integration

status: Implement robust Bank of England API plugin with proper XML namespace handling and error recovery.
## Current Issue
Bank of England API calls are failing with no data returned for series:
- IUQABEDR (UK Base Rate)
- IUDBEDR (UK Bank Rate)
- XUQABK67 (GBP/USD Exchange Rate)
## Root Cause
The current XML parsing implementation doesn't properly handle SDMX namespaces and API response structure
## Required Changes
- Implement proper XML namespace registration and handling
- Add fallback parsing methods for robustness
- Enhance error handling and retry logic
- Update request headers and parameters for API compatibility
- Add comprehensive testing for BoE series
## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] All three BoE series return valid data
- [ ] Proper error handling for API rate limits and blocks
- [ ] Support for both namespace and non-namespace XML parsing
- [ ] Data quality validation for extracted observations
## Technical Notes
- API endpoint: https://www.bankofengland.co.uk/boeapps/database/_iadb-fromshowcolumns.asp
- Uses SDMX XML format with generic namespaces
- Requires proper User-Agent and Referer headers
